Name: Swapnil  Kilanjar
Comment: Wayyyyy better than HP and DELL mouse I have used in the past. Due to its curves the hands fit perfectly. Compared to the old mouse it simply glides on the mouse pad and operation is smooth as silk. It's feather light weight and extremely pleasant to hold. The price is a big positive and I'm glad I made this decision. Just go for it.
